headline.main: PLOESTI SMASHED; 300 Tons Rain on Major Gasoline Source of Reich Air Force

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Aug. 1 -- A daylight air attack that "may materially affect the course of the war" smashed the oil refineries and dependent installations at Ploesti, Rumania, where fully one-third of the Axis' petroleum supplies for use in aircraft, tanks, transport vehicles, submarines and surface hips is believed to originate.
abstract: Leads US raid on Ploesti oil fields
